TlipocaMod:Deterrent.NAME: Deterrent
TlipocaMod:Deterrent.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak and Vulnerable. tlipocamod:Temporarily lower a card's cost by 1.

TlipocaMod:Execution.NAME: Execution
TlipocaMod:Execution.DESCRIPTION: tlipocamod:Ephemeral. Deal !D! damage. If no card (except X-cost cards) in your hand costs higher, it crits: deal !M! times damage. If Fatal, critical hits deal an additional 1Ã— damage in this run.

TlipocaMod:Scarlet.NAME: Scarlet

TlipocaMod:Pale.NAME: Pale

TlipocaMod:BloodRites.NAME: Blood Rite
TlipocaMod:BloodRites.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If Fatal, Transform a card in your deck. Exhaust.

TlipocaMod:Leech.NAME: Leech
TlipocaMod:Leech.DESCRIPTION: Enemy loses X Strength, gain X Strength. Exhaust.
TlipocaMod:Leech.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Enemy loses X+1 Strength, gain X+1 Strength. Exhaust.

TlipocaMod:Justitia.NAME: "Justitia"
TlipocaMod:Justitia.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Can only play when its cost is 0. If Fatal, permanently lower its cost in this run by 1.

TlipocaMod:SoulFragment.NAME: Soul Fragment
TlipocaMod:SoulFragment.DESCRIPTION: Increase the cost of a card in your hand by 1 in this combat. Gain [E] [E] [E] .
TlipocaMod:SoulFragment.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Increase the cost of a card in your hand by 2 in this combat. Gain [E] [E] [E] [E] .

TlipocaMod:DeathEye.NAME: Eye Of The Death
TlipocaMod:DeathEye.DESCRIPTION: tlipocamod:Eternity .Successively put !M! cards in the draw pile to the top of the pile. Exhaust.
TlipocaMod:DeathEye.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. tlipocamod:Eternity. Successively put !M! cards in the draw pile to the top of the pile. Exhaust.

TlipocaMod:Twin.NAME: Twin
TlipocaMod:Twin.DESCRIPTION: In this battle, increase the cost of a card in your hand by 1 and cast it twice when played. Exhaust.

TlipocaMod:Solidify.NAME: Solidify
TlipocaMod:Solidify.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. Double its base block for each [E] increase in this card's cost.

TlipocaMod:PowerUnleash.NAME: Power Unleash
TlipocaMod:PowerUnleash.DESCRIPTION: Gain energy equal to the sum of the cost of your hand. Exhaust.
TlipocaMod:PowerUnleash.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. Gain energy equal to the sum of the cost of your hand. Exhaust.

TlipocaMod:Midnight.NAME: Midnight
TlipocaMod:Midnight.DESCRIPTION: Randomly play a card with the highest cost in your hand. If it's not removed from the combat, put it on the top of the draw pile.
TlipocaMod:Midnight.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Play a card with the highest cost in your hand. If it's not removed from the combat, put it on the top of the draw pile.

TlipocaMod:Summon.NAME: Summon
TlipocaMod:Summon.DESCRIPTION: Draw till the card drawn costs the greatest in your hand. Exhaust.
TlipocaMod:Summon.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw till the card drawn costs the greatest in your hand.

TlipocaMod:ReaperForm.NAME: Reaper Form
TlipocaMod:ReaperForm.DESCRIPTION: Raise your max HP by !M! when a non-Minion enemy dies thoroughly.

TlipocaMod:Samsara.NAME: Samsara
TlipocaMod:Samsara.DESCRIPTION: tlipocamod:Eternity. End your turn. After this turn, take an extra turn in which all cards' cost is raised tlipocamod:Temporarily by !M! . Exhaust.

TlipocaMod:Dust.NAME: Dust
TlipocaMod:Dust.DESCRIPTION: tlipocamod:Eternity. Deal !D! damage. Gain !B! block. Draw !M! card.

TlipocaMod:Annihilate.NAME: Annihilate
TlipocaMod:Annihilate.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. Lose 1 Strength .Strength affect this card !M! times.

TlipocaMod:Parclose.NAME: Parclose
TlipocaMod:Parclose.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards, then put a card in your hand to the top of the draw pile. Gain !B! block for each cost of that card.

TlipocaMod:Meteor.NAME: Meteor
TlipocaMod:Meteor.DESCRIPTION: Look at the top !M! cards of your draw pile. Exhaust one of them. Deal damage to all enemies equal to twice the squared cost of the exhausted card.

TlipocaMod:DarkestHour.NAME: Darkest Hour
TlipocaMod:DarkestHour.DESCRIPTION: Increase ALL your cards' cost by !M! for the rest of combat, whenever you draw 1 card, gain [E] .

TlipocaMod:Awaken.NAME: Awaken
TlipocaMod:Awaken.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you lose [E] [E] [E] ,draw !M! card. Cannot stack.

TlipocaMod:Blades.NAME: Blades
TlipocaMod:Blades.DESCRIPTION: Deal X damage to ALL enemies X times.
TlipocaMod:Blades.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal X+1 damage to ALL enemies X+1 times.

TlipocaMod:Slaughter.NAME: Slaughter
TlipocaMod:Slaughter.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy X times.

TlipocaMod:Godhead.NAME: Godhead
TlipocaMod:Godhead.DESCRIPTION: After playing the first card with cost more than 1 each turn, gain energy equal to the cost.

TlipocaMod:Inspiration.NAME: Inspiration
TlipocaMod:Inspiration.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 X-cost cards of any color to add into your hand. Exhaust.
TlipocaMod:Inspiration.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 upgraded X-cost cards of any color to add into your hand. Exhaust.

TlipocaMod:Misery.NAME: Misery
TlipocaMod:Misery.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak, Vulnerable and tlipocamod:Bleed. Exhaust.

TlipocaMod:HeartPierceStrike.NAME: Heart Pierce Strike
TlipocaMod:HeartPierceStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Apply tlipocamod:Bleed equal to the unblocked damage.

TlipocaMod:Erosion.NAME: Erosion
TlipocaMod:Erosion.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose !M! Strength this turn. Apply !M! tlipocamod:Bleed to ALL enemies. Exhaust.

TlipocaMod:Contagion.NAME: Contagion
TlipocaMod:Contagion.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! tlipocamod:Bleed to ALL enemies at the start of your turn.

TlipocaMod:GrievousWounds.NAME: Grievous Wounds
TlipocaMod:GrievousWounds.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an Attack deals unblocked damage, apply !M! tlipocamod:Bleed.

TlipocaMod:Collapse.NAME: Collapse
TlipocaMod:Collapse.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. tlipocamod:Bleed will not be reduced at the start of turn now.
TlipocaMod:Collapse.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: tlipocamod:Bleed will not be reduced at the start of turn now.

TlipocaMod:Present.NAME: Present
TlipocaMod:Present.DESCRIPTION: Apply tlipocamod:Eternity to ALL cards in your hand in this combat. Exhaust.
TlipocaMod:Present.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. Apply tlipocamod:Eternity to ALL cards in your hand in this combat. Exhaust.

TlipocaMod:Maintenance.NAME: Maintenance
TlipocaMod:Maintenance.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your next X turns, gain [E] and draw !M! cards. Exhaust.

TlipocaMod:Recycle.NAME: Recycle
TlipocaMod:Recycle.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card, gain energy equal to its cost.

TlipocaMod:Contract.NAME: Contract
TlipocaMod:Contract.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. tlipocamod:Temporarily increase a card's cost in this turn by !M! .

TlipocaMod:Torrent.NAME: Torrent
TlipocaMod:Torrent.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each [E] you now have.

TlipocaMod:Mystery.NAME: Mystery
TlipocaMod:Mystery.DESCRIPTION: tlipocamod:Ephemeral. Draw a card. Gain [E] . Can be Upgraded any number of times. Exhaust.
TlipocaMod:Mystery.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: tlipocamod:Ephemeral. Draw a card. Gain !M! [E] . Can be Upgraded any number of times. Exhaust.

TlipocaMod:Serenade.NAME: Serenade
TlipocaMod:Serenade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Reduce ALL cards' cost this turn in your hand to 0 and apply tlipocamod:Ephemeral to them in this turn.

TlipocaMod:Rend.NAME: Rend
TlipocaMod:Rend.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If target is tlipocamod:Bleeding, deal double damage. If unblocked damage was dealt, apply !M! tlipocamod:Bleed. If both, apply !M! Vulnerable.

TlipocaMod:Echo.NAME: Echo
TlipocaMod:Echo.DESCRIPTION: Apply tlipocamod:Resonate to ALL cards in your hand for the rest of combat. Exhaust.

TlipocaMod:TwistedMind.NAME: Twisted Mind
TlipocaMod:TwistedMind.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If the card's cost is not 2 when played, gain [E] [E] .

TlipocaMod:Coronate.NAME: Coronate
TlipocaMod:Coronate.DESCRIPTION: Gain Strength equal to !M! times X.

TlipocaMod:Astrology.NAME: Astrology
TlipocaMod:Astrology.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Look at the !M! cards at the bottom of your draw pile, put one of them into your hand.

TlipocaMod:Edge.NAME: Edge
TlipocaMod:Edge.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. Put a card in your hand to the top of the draw pile. Add *Shivs equal to its cost into your hand.

TlipocaMod:DeathKnell.NAME: Death Knell
TlipocaMod:DeathKnell.DESCRIPTION: Retain. Deal !D! damage. Increase its cost by !M! and double its basic damage for the rest of this combat. Shuffle this card into your draw pile.

TlipocaMod:Eliminate.NAME: Eliminate
TlipocaMod:Eliminate.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Only ONCE for each combat: If Fatal, heal !M! HP.

TlipocaMod:Gaze.NAME: Gaze
TlipocaMod:Gaze.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Gain [E] equal to the top card's cost of the draw pile. When in your hand, you can see the top card of the draw pile.

TlipocaMod:RustyBlade.NAME: Rusty Blade
TlipocaMod:RustyBlade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, if break an enemy's Block, apply !M! tlipocamod:Bleed. NL Draw a card.

TlipocaMod:Destiny.NAME: Destiny
TlipocaMod:Destiny.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Put a random card with the highest cost in the draw pile into your hand.

TlipocaMod:Cleanse.NAME: Cleanse
TlipocaMod:Cleanse.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Randomize a card's cost.

TlipocaMod:Reckoning.NAME: Reckoning
TlipocaMod:Reckoning.DESCRIPTION: Remove enemy's Block. NL Deal !D! damage for each tlipocamod:Bleed layer enemy has. Exhaust.
TlipocaMod:Reckoning.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. Remove enemy's Block. NL Deal !D! damage for each tlipocamod:Bleed layer enemy has. Exhaust.

TlipocaMod:Immortal.NAME: Immortal
TlipocaMod:Immortal.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block X times. NL You can Retain at most X cards this turn.

TlipocaMod:Overwhelm.NAME: Overwhelm
TlipocaMod:Overwhelm.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. Randomize a card's cost.

TlipocaMod:Breakdown.NAME: Breakdown
TlipocaMod:Breakdown.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Gain !M! Strength, lose !M! Strength at the end of turn. Randomize the cost of this card in your hand during this turn after playing cards.

TlipocaMod:Whisper.NAME: Whisper
TlipocaMod:Whisper.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Draw !M! cards. Apply tlipocamod:Resonate to them in this combat. Exhaust.

TlipocaMod:ParadiseLost.NAME: Paradise Lost
TlipocaMod:ParadiseLost.DESCRIPTION: Remove ALL enemies' Block. NL Apply !M! tlipocamod:Bleed to ALL enemies. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

TlipocaMod:ParadiseRegained.NAME: Paradise Regained
TlipocaMod:ParadiseRegained.DESCRIPTION: Whoever doesn't have Block gains !B! Block. Exhaust.

TlipocaMod:Extraction.NAME: Extraction
TlipocaMod:Extraction.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] equal to a card's cost. tlipocamod:Temporarily double its cost.
TlipocaMod:Extraction.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. Gain [E] equal to a card's cost. tlipocamod:Temporarily double its cost.

TlipocaMod:Sacrifice.NAME: Sacrifice
TlipocaMod:Sacrifice.DESCRIPTION: When target lose HP due to tlipocamod:Bleed, ALL other enemies lose equivalent HP. NL Exhaust.
TlipocaMod:Sacrifice.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: When target lose HP due to tlipocamod:Bleed, ALL other enemies lose equivalent HP. NL Apply !M! tlipocamod:Bleed. Exhaust.

TlipocaMod:Mercy.NAME: Mercy
TlipocaMod:Mercy.DESCRIPTION: tlipocamod:Ephemeral. Ethereal. You can no longer deal Attack damage this turn. Draw !M! cards. Gain [E] . Exhaust.

TlipocaMod:Scale.NAME: Scale
TlipocaMod:Scale.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card. Add a *Sentence with X equals to its cost into your hand. Exhaust.
TlipocaMod:Scale.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card. Add a *Sentence with X equals to its cost into your hand. It costs 0 until played. Exhaust.

TlipocaMod:Vilify.NAME: Vilify
TlipocaMod:Vilify.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Strength for each kind of debuff enemy has.
TlipocaMod:Vilify.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: tlipocamod:Resonate. Gain 1 Strength for each kind of debuff enemy has.

TlipocaMod:Insight.NAME: Insight
TlipocaMod:Insight.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! tlipocamod:Bleed. If enemy intends to attack, gain !B! block. Otherwise, deal !D! damage. Exhaust.

TlipocaMod:Afire.NAME: Afire
TlipocaMod:Afire.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If the enemy is tlipocamod:Bleeding, gain [E] and draw 1 card.

TlipocaMod:ObscureTheSun.NAME: Eclipse
TlipocaMod:ObscureTheSun.DESCRIPTION: Apply X Weak, Vulnerable, and tlipocamod:Bleed to all enemies. All enemies lose X Strength this turn. Exhaust.
TlipocaMod:ObscureTheSun.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply X+1 Weak, Vulnerable, and tlipocamod:Bleed to all enemies. All enemies lose X+1 Strength this turn. Exhaust.

TlipocaMod:MagicBullet.NAME: Magic Bullet
TlipocaMod:MagicBullet.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Look at the top !M! cards of your draw pile and put one into your hand. Repeat the damage based on its cost.

TlipocaMod:StarlightSeize.NAME: Starlight Seize
TlipocaMod:StarlightSeize.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 cards with a cost of 2 or more of any color to add into your hand. Exhaust.
TlipocaMod:StarlightSeize.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 cards with a cost of 2 or more of any color to add into your hand. Apply tlipocamod:Resonate to it in this combat. Exhaust.

TlipocaMod:Bloodthirst.NAME: Bloodthirst
TlipocaMod:Bloodthirst.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Heal for the tlipocamod:Bleed stack amount when triggers tlipocamod:Bleed. Exhaust.

TlipocaMod:Virtue.NAME: Virtue
TlipocaMod:Virtue.DESCRIPTION: The next time you receive debuff, negates it and gain 1 Strength. Exhaust.
TlipocaMod:Virtue.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The next !M! times you receive debuff, negates it and gain 1 Strength. Exhaust.

TlipocaMod:FirstMove.NAME: First Move
TlipocaMod:FirstMove.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. You can Retain !M! card this turn.
TlipocaMod:FirstMove.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. You can Retain at most !M! cards this turn.

TlipocaMod:Blossom.NAME: Blossom
TlipocaMod:Blossom.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Draw 1 card. NL Next turn, draw !M! card.
TlipocaMod:Blossom.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Draw 1 card. NL Next turn, draw !M! cards.

TlipocaMod:Thrift.NAME: Thrift
TlipocaMod:Thrift.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, gain !M! Block for each remaining [E] .

TlipocaMod:Grief.NAME: Grief
TlipocaMod:Grief.DESCRIPTION: Cannot be removed from your deck. NL At the end of your turn or whenever you play a card, add a copy of it into your hand.

TlipocaMod:Humanity.NAME: Humanity
TlipocaMod:Humanity.DESCRIPTION: When you play an X-cost card, gain !M! Block for each [E] in its cost.

TlipocaMod:0.DESCRIPTION: Change a card's cost in this combat to 0

TlipocaMod:1.DESCRIPTION: Change a card's cost in this combat to 1

TlipocaMod:2.DESCRIPTION: Change a card's cost in this combat to 2

TlipocaMod:3.DESCRIPTION: Change a card's cost in this combat to 3
